text: Altenstadt is a municipality in Neu-Ulm in Bavaria in Germany. The municipality is in middle Swabia in the valley of the Iller, about 30 km south of Ulm and 25 km north of Memmingen. ==Districts== Altenstadt is arranged into 7 districts. The districts are: * Altenstadt * Bergenstetten * Dattenhausen * Filzingen * Herrenstetten * Illereichen * Untereichen ==Sights== Illereichen Marktstrasse 38 40 003.jpg|Torhaus, Illereichen Illereichen Schloss 001.jpg|Tower of a former castle complex ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:Neu-Ulm (district)
title: Altenstadt, Swabia
